name: Samsung Slimline DVD Drive
des: A slim and compact DVD drive from Samsung, suitable for laptops and desktops that require basic optical disc reading and writing capabilities.

name: Samsung External USB DVD Drive
des: An external DVD drive with USB connectivity from Samsung, designed for laptops and computers without built-in optical drives, suitable for reading and writing DVDs.

name: Samsung Internal DVD Drive
des: An internal DVD drive for desktop computers from Samsung, offering reliable DVD disc reading and writing capabilities for various applications.

name: Samsung Compact DVD Writer
des: A compact DVD writer from Samsung, suitable for ultrabooks and devices with limited space, designed for reading and writing DVDs.
